author: Jenny Gross
title: U.K. Calls for EU to Recognize Its Regulation Post-Brexit
text:
LONDON—U.K. Brexit secretary David Davis on Thursday said he envisioned a future trade agreement between the U.K. and the European Union that would levy zero tariffs and relied on each side respecting each other’s regulations on products and services.
Brussels has said it wants a zero-tariff trade deal with the U.K. but has consistently rejected the idea that the EU would recognize different regulatory regimes for products and services set in the U.K.
...
